instructions: **Fallout 3.0**Whole Sheet: Not being familiar with the rule set resulted in this sheet lacking a few buttons and details that might otherwise have been added.   The sheet has now been released-to-the-wild and I might update it when I get the chance.Prime Tab: Include bio-blocks, Primary Statistics, and Secondary Statistics.  The Secondary Statistics auto-calc, with a block added for modifiers after the fact.Skill tab: The buttons roll a d100 and show the skill rating next to itCombat Tab: Armor records the rating, but is not calculated.  Current hitpoints are user-entered, but the maxiumum is auto-claced based on level.  The weapon buttons include a damage roll, regardless if the the roll hit.  Trait tab: A repeating field for recording perks, traits, and so on.  The trait names can be changed.InventoryTab: Another repeating field for recording gear.To Do: vehicle tab, roll template (dev only) taking into account range, targetted attack roll with built range, targetted attack roll taking in account damage threshold and resistance
